name: Monster Hunter (AfvanVijayAakash)
description:
Hi Guys:

Save yourself from the wave of monsters attacking you in your garden. You can shoot and kill the monsters. And also we added a special ability where you can activate the DISTRACTION TOWER and divert the monsters. Take this chance to kill the monster and Get high score. This is an endless game.

Controls:

WASD to MOVE

RIGHT CLICK to AIM

LEFT CLICK to SHOOT

Q to ACTIVATE DISTRACTION TOWER (ABILITY)

Developed by

Afvan MJ

Vijay Aakash
